examples: We have to go cap in hand begging for funds.
He asked me, cap in hand, if I could help him out of his financial difficulties.
We'll need our thinking caps to solve this one.
They went to the teacher, cap in hand, and asked for more time to complete their project.
There's no way he'll go cap in hand to his brother.
words.defineEn: a type of soft flat hat with a visor, typically worn by men and boys, often as part of a uniform
words.defineVi: một loại mũ phẳng mềm có tấm che mặt, thường được đội bởi nam giới và trẻ em trai, thường là một phần của đồng phục

words.defineEn: a scarf with the logo and name of a football team that fans of the team wear to show their support, respect, loyalty, etc.
words.defineVi: một chiếc khăn có logo và tên của một đội bóng đá mà người hâm mộ của đội đó đeo để thể hiện sự ủng hộ, tôn trọng, lòng trung thành của họ, v.v.

words.defineEn: a ring, usually made of metal or plastic, that people use to keep their keys together
words.defineVi: một chiếc nhẫn, thường được làm bằng kim loại hoặc nhựa, mà mọi người sử dụng để giữ chìa khóa của họ với nhau

examples: The coffee in the mug was a dark.
Dana set the mug of tea down.
Baking soda sprinkled on a damp cloth effectively removed coffee and tea stains from cups and mugs.
The mug goes with my shirt.
Coffee mugs exist for coffee drinkers.
words.defineEn: a large cup that has no saucer and is used for drinking
words.defineVi: một cái cốc lớn không có đĩa và được dùng để uống

examples: I dropped another plate!
They used disposable plates for the picnic.
The restaurant served a mouthwatering plate of spaghetti with bolognese pasta sauce.
Our waiter cleared the empty plates from the table.
The plate of pasta was finished with a garnish of grated Parmesan cheese.
words.defineEn: a flat, typically round dish that we eat from or serve food on
words.defineVi: một đĩa phẳng, thường tròn mà chúng ta ăn hoặc phục vụ thức ăn trên

examples: My little daughter wears a fluffy coat that makes her look like a teddy bear.
Teddy was six years old.
But he was just a teddy bear to everybody.
"You did, Teddy?" she said.
They’re hairy, like tiny flying teddy bears.
words.defineEn: a toy that is made of soft materials and looks like a bear
words.defineVi: một món đồ chơi được làm bằng vật liệu mềm và trông giống như một con gấu

examples: He was wearing jeans and a T-shirt.
She always wears a plain white T-shirt with jeans.
I spilled ketchup on my T-shirt while eating lunch.
She folded her T-shirt and put it neatly in the drawer.
I'm going to iron my T-shirt to make it look neat and wrinkle-free.
words.defineEn: a casual short-sleeved shirt with no collar, usually made of cotton
words.defineVi: một chiếc áo sơ mi ngắn tay bình thường không có cổ áo, thường được làm bằng cotton

examples: I collected seashells as souvenirs from the beautiful island.
She bought a beautiful piece of European pottery as a souvenir.
Salesmen of unofficial souvenirs have also been doing a roaring trade.
Some species even have fingernails on their flippers, old souvenirs from their ancient days on land.
Simon showed us souvenirs like this jade cicada.
words.defineEn: something that we usually buy and bring back for other people from a place that we have visited on vacation
words.defineVi: thứ gì đó mà chúng ta thường mua và mang về cho người khác từ một nơi mà chúng ta đã đến trong kỳ nghỉ

examples: Put your name here.
Here's the heart of the matter, Bill.
Here, wet your whistle.
Here are my calculations.
Come here!
words.defineEn: to, in, or at this position or place
words.defineVi: đến, trong, hoặc tại vị trí này hoặc địa điểm

examples: Get a load of George over there.
The buck stopped there with Carl.
They still get cases of typhoid there.
That monument has been there since the year one.
There was trouble on hand.
words.defineEn: to, in, or at a place that is not where the speaker is
words.defineVi: đến, trong hoặc tại một nơi không phải là nơi người nói đang ở
